segments.text: Hello . Can I ask what steps I have to go through in applying for the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is not very complicated . You can send your resume to the e-mail address of our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our personnel clerk will screen all the resumes that we receive , select the eligible ones and arrange the interview for them .
segments.speaker: S2
